_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Wednesday, February 11, 5:51am -  After a fresh 6" on upper mountain last night, it's starting to look like winter again. Expect delays on the upper mountain as Patrol works on snow safety mitigation. With new snow and more in the forecast, please practice deep snow safety: Ride with a partner, avoid the base of trees, and if you are going to fall, attempt to do so feet first.

Today, snow, mainly before 1pm, then snow showers. Some thunder is also possible. High near 38. The chance of precipitation is 90%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 1-2 inches possible on upper mountain.

Firm conditions still exist. Please remember to ski with caution and leave plenty of room for stopping, and allow more distance from other riders.  

  • Parking reservations are every weekend and holiday. Learn more about our Parking Program and Carpool Incentives.
  • For real time information at your fingertips, download the Ikon Pass App for updates on lift status, events, weather, and more.
_inspectorSnowReport.Alert: In an emergency, please contact: Palisades Dispatch 1 (530) 452-7145 | Alpine Dispatch 1 (530) 581-8222
